name: Comigo and the Vacation of Fusion
name_original: Comigo and the Vacation of Fusion
description:
Welcome to my Vacation of Fusion!

Fuse elements, create your island, take selfies, and reveal three mysterious relics!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to move around!
  • In creative mode, moving the cursor to the screen edge also works!
  • Drag runes to tiles and created objects to initiate fusing!
  • Zoom in and out with mouse wheel!
  • Press the camera icon at the top right corner of the screen to take a selfie!
  • Send selfies in the comments section :b
  • Have fun and be creative!
Made for Mini Jam 50: Islands!

Made with my fabulous ct.js:
